description: Encodes/Decodes data in the data section of ICMP Echo requests/responses

--hostname.help: Remote Server Addresses (not working for 127.0.0.1, localhost, etc)

--request-timeout.help: Timeout in second to wait for a socket reply.

--max-size.help: Maximum size in bytes of the sotp packet to be embedded in the icmp data section (49120 bytes max)

--poll-delay.help: Time in seconds between pollings (in order not to saturate when not transmitting)

--response-timeout.help: Waiting time in seconds for wrapper data.
